title: Fragment, 19th century
medium:
silk, cotton, and metal plain compound cloth
Woven
description: Yellow horizontally ribbed ground.  Ground divided into roughly oval areas by lacy bands in extra white silk weft.  In centre of each oval a small spray of flowers in extra wefts of red, pink, green and blue silk.  Flat gold strips originally over yellow ground.

tombstone.epitaph:
Fragment, 19th century.silk, cotton, and metal plain compound cloth
Woven. Gift of George A. Hearn. 1899-10-25-b/d.
